(Simplified: 岘)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A mountain 山 that affords a good view 見; 見 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
①(峴山)山名，在中國湖北省。亦稱“峴首山”。
②小而高的山嶺。
峴港 [ xiàn gǎng ]: Da Nang or Danang, Vietnam
峴首山 [ xiàn shǒu shān ]: Mt Xianshou in Hubei

峴字的基本解释

峴
xiàn
见“岘”。

峴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》胡典切，上銑，匣。］
“岘1”的繁体字。
(1)小而高的山岭。
(2)山名。即湖北岘山。

峴字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峴； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页312第02
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡典切，賢上聲。【玉篇】山名，在今襄陽。【晉書·羊祜傳】祜與鄧潤甫登峴山，垂涕曰：自有宇宙，便有此山，因立?。後人名墮淚?。　又大峴，山名，在靑齊。又【集韻】山小而險。一曰嶺上平也。【謝靈運·嶺溪行】迢遞陟陘峴。【註】嶺小高也。【韻會】峴，本作現。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guang Yun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
The traditional characters of "line 1".
(1) Small and high mountains.
(2) The name of the mountain. Namely Hubei Xianshan.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　 Xian; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 312 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Dianqie, Xian said. [Jade articles] The name of the mountain, in today's Xiangyang. [Book of Jin·Biography of Yanghu] Hu and Deng Runfu ascended to Xianshan, and said, "If there is a universe, there is this mountain. The name of the posterity fell into tears?.　Daxian, the name of the mountain, is in Qianqi. Also 【Jiyun】The mountain is small and dangerous. One said Lingshangping also. 【Xie Lingyun·Lingxi Travel】Delivering Zhixingxian. [Note] Ling Xiao Gao also. [Rhyme Club] Xian, this is now.
